=== Materials of a web meeting 16 December 2014 ===

16 December a webex meeting was arranged by ZAMG to discuss the status of ororad work. Participants were Clemens, Yann, Alexandre, Laura.  Slides about preparation of orofields, 3D and MUSC sensitivity tests and other first results were shown and made available below. In discussion the results were analysed and further steps agreed. Experiments with MUSC, stand-alone SURFEX (PGD generation), 3D will be continued and reported in ASW15 and ICAM 2015.

How to create input_dem from pieces with gdalbuildvrt (advise by Matti Horttanainen, FMI)

gdalbuildvrt srtm.vrt *.tif

Cutting, modifying resulting virtual file (vrt):

gdal_translate -co COMPRESS=DEFLATE -a_srs EPSG:4326 -projwin 3 50 18 42 srtm.vrt  srtm_alpit.tif
